# characterPicker

**Type Property**

The standard identifier for selecting special characters such as Emoji.

## Declaration

```swift
static let characterPicker: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier
```

## Creating identifiers for multiple choice items

- **candidateList**: The standard identifier for a candidate list bar item.

items.description: The standard identifier for a candidate list bar item.
items.name: candidateList
